word:
Sanitarium, Cal., Oct. 30, 1906. 
Dear Brother-----,-- 
     The school at Madison must be treated fairly, yes, right loyally. If all will act a part to help this school, the Lord will bless them. I am determined to act my part. I have not lost one jot of my interest in the Southern field. I want to act a part in helping all lines of the work.
